id.dldescription: Unique Id of the herd movement event

dairyHerdEventId.dldescription: herd event id that this movement event is part of

typeOfMovement.dldescription: Type of movement either Arrival or Departure

date.dldescription: The date the movement event occured

farmId.dldescription: Unique Id of the Farm used in the movement event

holdingPlace.dldescription: Government Id for the barn to which the animal arrives

locationId.dldescription: Identification of the herd from which the animals have been transferred from

ownerType.dldescription: The type of the previous owner (Farm, Agent, Ministry Customer)

transferCause.dldescription: the cause/reason for transfer of the animals
